Class Flower

java.lang.Object
  Flower

public class Flower
extends java.lang.Object

A Flower object represents a cartoon flower that is drawn in a window. When the flower is first planted, it is small and green. grow(double step) will make it grow taller by step, and bloom() will make it flower - the head gets larger and changes colour.

Constructor Summary
Flower(double x, double y)
          Construct a new Flower object; parameters are the initial position of the flower.
 
Method Summary
 void bloom()
          Makes the flower bloom, It first erases the flower, then changes the state, and then draws the flower again.
 void erase()
          Erases the flower, so that it can be redrawn.
 void grow(double step)
          Makes the flower taller.
 
Methods inherited from class
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

Flower

public Flower(double x,
              double y)
Construct a new Flower object; parameters are the initial position of the flower. Makes a new Flower and draws it.

Method Detail

bloom

public void bloom()
Makes the flower bloom, It first erases the flower, then changes the state, and then draws the flower again.

erase

public void erase()
Erases the flower, so that it can be redrawn.

grow

public void grow(double step)
Makes the flower taller. It first erases the flower, then changes the height by the specified amount, and then redraws the flower .
